website_summaries.verdict: We know why these mats are so popular: They’re heavy duty, get great results, and are inexpensive.
pros: Thicker than most, these non-stick mats last longer, protecting grills and ovens from drips and grease
cons: Some owners report problems with flareups on edges

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE FOR BACON!
customer_reviews.text: I doubt it was the fault of the product. We tested it with steak and bacon. Unfortunately the bacon grease pooled and then caught fire within seconds and destroyed the Mat. We used baking soda to put out the fire that was melting the mat. DO NOT COOK BACON! Ruined~First attempt to use
customer_reviews.author: Hsdx3

customer_reviews.title: Left disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get the mats for our brand new grill but became quickly disappointed when they literally stuck directly to the food and disintegrated the third time using them.
customer_reviews.author: ashley tressler

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two months at most!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am supper disappointed!! I got these in August when we got our new grill and they worked supper great at first but my husband already had to toss on sheet and the second sheet we have left is barely holding up - see picture above. This was no value for money!! Im gonna reach out to them to see if their guarantee is for real.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thomassen

customer_reviews.title: This item just on good for 1-2 times used it
customer_reviews.text: This item just on good for 1-2 times used it, after that will become like this, so don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not Happpy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave these mats 5-stars; however, the mats lasted only for 10 uses. They developed holes and fell apart ... What a disappointment! I bought another set a month ago; I have used them only one time. I am hoping these will last ...
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. Used less than 8 time, the plastic start to come off. I’m trying to contact amazon for a return because they said 7 yrs warrantee on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited for this :(
customer_reviews.text: We finally got to use it this passed weekend and after one use it is falling apart !! On top of that it has holes in it too ( see picture). It’s like the threading ( or whatever it is) is unraveling around the edges as well. Idk what happened but I know this isn’t a one time use product lol
customer_reviews.author: Mastermaker

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, BEST grill mats ever.
customer_reviews.text: These grill mats are far superior to the garbage ones I have used in the past. The first time I used them, it was so obvious to see. The nonstick properties of these are so much better. The fact they are so much thicker also makes a world of difference. And the fact these can be used up to 600 degrees is also an added perk. I have tried several other mats from Amazon that just didn't hold up. I have already ordered a second set to send to my brother, who is also an avid griller. If you're looking for grill mats, spend the extra couple dollars and get the best.
customer_reviews.author: lanegan

customer_reviews.title: These mats are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These grill mats are for real. They leave grill marks just like on your grates, it eliminates the mess all over your grill, you can cook small items without them falling through the grill grates, its non-stick, so you don't loose any meat that sticks to the grates and its super easy to clean. I can't believe I didn't know about these wonderful but simple mats in all my years of grilling. I don't think I will ever grill without them from now on! I've tried other mats with similar results but these are heavy duty, thicker and feel like they will last a long time with many uses. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mono

customer_reviews.title: Much better than using foil to line a grill
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm impressed! Much better than using foil to line a grill. Used it for the first time yesterday and it did a good job of preventing flare ups while grilling burgers and ham steaks. Downside is though that the picture shows grill marks on the steak for this item. Yea unless I am doing something wrong no grill marks are ever going to present themselves. think of these as pan frying without all the juices staying in the pan. Good for those meats that typically have a higher fat content and thus flare more. Good news is that grill marks are possible. Just take the mat off at the end of cooking and briefly grill over the open fire.
customer_reviews.author: Mendelson Family

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this two days ago and have used it twice. I have had zero issues, cooked an egg right on the grill, sliced mushrooms, scallops, cherry tomatoes, and I don't worry about a thing falling through. Nothing sticks. Cleanup takes two seconds. I love these things!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: 7 year warranty from nobody.
customer_reviews.text: This mat withstand the first time I've BBQ with it with some scratches along the way but after four times I've used it there was wear and tear to it that I cannot used it anymore. I tried to contact them but there is no way to contact them at all. Won't bother to buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: F Toole

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Black substance washed off matt during cleaning and it wasn't smoke or char
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but gotta work at technique!
customer_reviews.text: Ok for grilling, but items must be super dry, as the water builds up on the mat. It's a challenge when grilling veggies or shrimp - something that expells a lot of water. You have to keep draining it off it you want it to "grill". So far, I've not been able to get the nice grill lines, but have only used it a couple of times. Will keep experimenting to see if I can figure out some better techniques. Still way easier than skewers for shrimp! Also nice when brushing on sauces. Great clean up too.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M

customer_reviews.title: however it would be nice if there were actual instructions (like don't use both ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is ok ... however it would be nice if there were actual instructions (like don't use both mats to cover your entire bbq, which may be common knowledge to everyone except me). They have a website (lame) and a facebook page (also not very helpful) to get "ideas" or tips on how to use mat. It would be nice if there was more info other than just how to clean it... disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chesty LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to preheat the grill mat with the barbecue cover closed
customer_reviews.text: On my first use of the Kona Best BBQ Grill Mat I thought I was following instructions and preheated the grill mat before adding food and had the cover of our Weber grill closed. The temperature must have exceeded the 600 degree tolerance of the plastic and the mat caught fire and burned! I was able to remove the mat with tongs and douse the fire with water from a garden hose but residue of the melted plastic remains on the grates and flavor bars. I have been afraid to use the grill since last August and may need to replace the entire grill because that plastic residue may give off fumes that are toxic.
customer_reviews.author: JMcono

customer_reviews.title: Quality grill map, but disappointing results.
customer_reviews.text: Works, but at recommended temperatures limits the food is not really "grilled",rather it's baked. Really no significant grill marks unless the temperature is at or above the 600 degree limit. I suspect people who like these, use them at higher than recommended temperatures. Also the meat juices pool and are problematic. Finally, they require cleaning after each use - not something I do with each use of normal grill grates. But, if you want a grill mat this brand is high quality. I bought it because of the stated 600 degree limit instead of 500. Maybe it's thicker than "cheaper" brands. If so, maybe this is why I don't get good grill marks?
customer_reviews.author: WI Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Experience!
customer_reviews.text: So, I waited to try these grill mats before rating the product. All I can say is WOW! I've tried dozens of different brands, and end up throwing them in the garbage...they just won't clean up easily. I reused the same mat three times with steaks, veggies in olive oil, and sausage with BBQ sauce. Five minutes in the sink? It's like Teflon. No soaking, no scrubbing, etc. Cleaned up with little or no effort! Another point...SUPER customer support! They sent a very complete and detailed follow-up email to check on my experience PLUS a very detailed explanation about the use and care of the mats. Great job! Well worth the extra cost...very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Clay C.

customer_reviews.title: Love my KONA grill mats!
customer_reviews.text: As the instructions suggested, I washed my mats and placed them on the grill, and started grilling. Oh my goodness! Such a pleasure not to have food falling through the grill.The mats heated up instantly, don't touch after placing on grill. My burgers cooked without burning, my chicken breasts were nice and juicy, and I received compliments on both. I'm delighted with my KONA mats. Can't wait to try and sautee vegetables on the grill too. I had a guest check them out, wanting to see if his were as thick as mine, he didn't think so.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Lasted One Year - In the trash as of yesterday
customer_reviews.text: After about the 3rd time of use I noticed peeling. It only got worst from there. So after yesterday's BBQ, they went to the trash. The coating was really peeling of. Also, they were never particularly easy to clean. Things will stick to them and they will need to be washed and scrubbed for stickiness to come out. For a product with a 7 year warranty, I expected a lot more that a year's worth of use. Note: The mats were never under direct flame on the grill or above 500 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: The Hs

customer_reviews.title: ... mat as soon as I received it in my beautiful new stainless grill
customer_reviews.text: Used this mat as soon as I received it in my beautiful new stainless grill. I had cooked on the grill 6 times with great results but this mat turned the inside of the hood, etc black. Threw the mat away and the extra one that came with it. Love the Kona gloves though.
customer_reviews.author: Old SubPrime

customer_reviews.title: Grill marks and more.
customer_reviews.text: These mats worked as described and I was pleased with the result. They are easy to clean and do leave grill marks on whatever is being cooked. If there's an issue is that the mat has such a non-stick surface that whatever you are cooking can slide around the mat. As such, use good tongs or a good spatula when trying to flip your food. One suggestion is to cut the mats to the size of your grill when you receive them. This will enable you to fully close the lid on the grill and retain heat for the cooking process.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: I love them, I will always use these mats for ...
customer_reviews.text: I had these for about 8 months, I had to throw mine away but I used these three or 4 times a week. I love them, I will always use these mats for grilling out. I’m getting a new set and an extra set for the camper. They don’t last forever but they do last you a long time. They keep your grill clean and they your food evenly cooked. You still get the grill marks and great flame cooked flavor. They are a must have even if you only cook out once in a while. GET THESE IF YOUR BUYING A NEW GRILL, they will keep it new looking for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: FJ-Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Lose the mess, not the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product when my parents first mentioned it. After getting tired of trying to keep my grill grate clean after each use, I broke down and bought these. They are amazing! I was worried I'd lose the smoky flavor gained from grilling directly on the grate, but the flavor is actually better with the kona mat. Chicken and pork chops don't dry out or stick to the grate. I wish I'd had these when I first bought my grill.
customer_reviews.author: BeanCounter

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use the mats. I followed directions regarding use and was very pleased with the outcome. Did brown the veggies and meat...didn't see grill marks but as long as it browned them I was happy. I put them in dishwasher since it said it was safe. Took them out and noticed they were slightly eaten away and fraying on the edges. Contacted seller and they asked for pics. Heard nothing for 2 weeks. Contacted again and they said just replace them through Amazon. Not too sure about the 2 year warranty. Disappointed as they worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Dms11855

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: buyer beware!! I have purchased better grill mats at local discount stores. These lastest 1 BBQ and now are frayed and literally useless. Either I recieved a bad batch or these 5 star reviews are bogus. Leaning towards bogus reviews.... I followed the cleaning/ preparation directions as directed, grill on coal BBQ, not flash flames and BBQ for 4 adults and one child. (2.5 hours at most) Again, bargen store mats held up for an entire season.
customer_reviews.author: MakePRGreatAgain

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for the first time this past week..have to admit I was sceptical..read horror reviews...two mats were basically the correct size...my husband cut about an inch off one...now they fit perfectly on our gas grill...prepared boneless pork chops and fresh asparagus for dinner...NO PROBLEM whatsoever ever...I love to see cook marks on my meats and vegetables...they were there...hassle that evening...did not clean mats until next day...washed them off in the sink with soap and water...came clean with little effort...returned to grill for a possible cookout with family tomorrow. I would highly recommend this product. Love the fact I do not have to clean the crate while still enjoying our grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Bell

customer_reviews.title: Kona grill mats work great. Keeps grill clean and sears meat to perfection.
customer_reviews.text: Some guys I play golf with recommended grill mats to keep my bar-b-q clean while still providing a seared result on steaks. I found Kona had high ratings on Amazon so I ordered them. I have used them for Halibut, sirloin steak and ground beef. I preheat the grill with the mats in place and in every case so far the meat or fish comes out as good or better than without them plus the grill is clean. They are easy to clean once they col off. I am glad I bought them and intend to purchase more for my other home. I have recommended them to friends and relatives. Sear lines still show on meat which I find amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is an unbelievable product, at first I was worried about the heating element being inhibited. To my surprise it cooked the steak that I placed on it in the same amount of time as if it were directly on the grill. It was even more amazing when I went to clean it, the mat rinses right off and it ran through the dishwasher no problem. I will definitely buy more of these in the future, and have already told a number of friends about it. P.S. They also say that if you leave a good review of the product that there is a chance that you may receive more products in the future so as to review.
customer_reviews.author: Sabina

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well.  Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We have tried multiple grill mats in the past. These are the best of the bunch. They are thicker and more durable. I downgraded the rating because when a flareup damaged the mat I was not impressed with customer service. The mats claim a seven year warranty. I admit that I forgot about that. When I went to repurchase, I noticed the warranty. I then e-mailed customer service. The response was quick. However, since I had thrown away the damaged mat, they would not honor the warranty. It was disappointing. So, in summary, good mat but if it is damaged you should keep it because they require you to mail back the damaged mat before they will do anything.
customer_reviews.author: THDTJC

customer_reviews.title: Will not grill without these ever again.
customer_reviews.text: These KONA Grill Mats are exactly as described, Heavy Duty for grilling. I purchased these to use on my stainless steel griddle on my grill to reduce the cleanup time on of the griddle. Well, I now have no cleanup of the griddle, just a couple seconds cleaning off the grill mat which I can do in my sink. I also have noticed that the food seemed to cook more evenly and did not have those few burn spots that I would end up with putting the meat straight on the griddle. I wish I would have purchased these along time ago. Will be purchasing more soon as backups.
customer_reviews.author: MLDecks

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT heat and scratch resistance!
customer_reviews.text: OK, I asked the seller if these could be used on a NuWave induction cooktop as a protector from cast iron pans. They said yes. they were right!! It is awesome. For some reason I was thinking they would be less slippery, but regardless they protect the cooktop very well and are not damaged by 500 degree heat.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Each time I use this it makes me happy. I use my grill more often now
customer_reviews.text: These grill mats make it possible to grill fish that does not fall apart when you try to scrape it off the grill..YIPPEE!! Each time I use this it makes me happy. I use my grill more often now, as there's no real need to scrape, wire brush or clean the grill..only the mats and they wash as though they were teflon! Makes cleanup a breeze and YES, it still leaves grill marks on your meats, whatever they are. Perfect! Just remember to not overheat them. This is simple if your grill has a thermometer. If not you just need to know that at normal cooking temps, these mats are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy food. Clean grill.
customer_reviews.text: Update to my original review: I bought a different grill mat from another seller as a gift. Not only is this brand (Kona) superior, but the customer service offered by Nickle's Arcade, LLC is unmatched! They really care. They are responsive and took care of me when I had an issue with my order. This is one of the best sellers on Amazon in any category. I would buy anything from them. Total trust earned. Thank you! Original product review: Awesome! Use this pad all the time. Keeps my grill clean and food tastes just like I cooked it directly on the fire. Use it myself and have bought more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: BT Prime

customer_reviews.title: The seller was fantastic about getting it to me as quickly as humanly ...
customer_reviews.text: If you ever get tired of food falling between the cracks on your grill or you wish that you could put vegetables and other small items without worrying about losing it between the cracks, then this is for you. Well made, durable, and everything that I expected it to be. The seller was fantastic about getting it to me as quickly as humanly possible and did a great job making sure that I am happy. I will certainly use them again and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bonsall

customer_reviews.title: Beats Yoshi Mats hands down
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Beats the copper mat (Yoshi brand) I was using previously which was a pain to clean especially if I cooked marinaded or rubbed items. I have not had any issues with flavor in terms of tasting anything but what I am actually cooking. Super easy to clean and I have noticed no issues with heat even when I got the burners on high. The Yoshi mat did not do as well in terms of high heat.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Nystrom

customer_reviews.title: Best Regards,
customer_reviews.text: Over I used four times one of two grill mate you send to mi I proceed to clean, as usual in the kitchen sink with a regular dish soup on one side he come off one black little piece and also all around it was very burned, then I tossed, and also I have a little observation you can noticed: when I buy this Grill Mats the pictures show a blue color and print on it Kona, what really I receive it was two black pieces. Sorry this is not a compline bat is real facts and for sure I don't buy this again. Best Regards, LM
customer_reviews.author: LIVIO MASSIGNANI

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Mats Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best grill mats I’ve found. I started using grill mats several years ago and liked them, but I absolutely love these KONA grill mats because they are heavy duty and very easy to clean. It is easy to understand why they are guaranteed for several years. If you love to grill but hate having to clean your grill, these are the mats to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Benoit

customer_reviews.title: REALLY HOLD UP!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just loves these grill mats. He has tried several brands, but he says these are the best. He has been using the same one for several months now. Just washes it and uses it again, and again. My brother-in-law saw them and was surprised how easily you could grill fish that has been coated in seasoned crumbs. We didn't want him to go home and purchase a cheaper brand, not like it, and give up trying to use them. So, we ordered him a set to get him started with the best. We highly recommend these mats. You won't be disappointed with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: b....47

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I like to start grilling a steak at 500 - 550 degrees so the higher heat range of the Kona mat is important. I grilled steak, chicken and shrimp on the mat and everything came out tasting great! No flare ups, no sticking and no hassles cleaning the mat or the grill. The Kona Grill Mat is definitely not the cheapest mat but it is the best that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: temperich

customer_reviews.title: Fell for the Hype... Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Bought these mats in an attempt to keep the grates clean. That it did, but BBQ temp would only go to 300-325f because the mats forced the heat down. It’s a lesson learned.... you want to fry an egg , well go at it. Grill some chicken breasts, it took too long to reach the proper internal temps. Ended up removing the mat and cook straight on the grates. Seriously, save your money, buy a good steam/ grill brush
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Baratta

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling and easy cleaning! - Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: We just got these and used them the other night. They are great for insuring nothing sticks. Grilling is made easier and I don't notice any difference in taste or appearance from cooking directly on the grill. Best of all, they clean up quick and easy. Update: After 4 or 5 uses, I noticed the surface of the matt was blistering and separating. After another use, it was toast. Too bad it didn't last. It definitely made clean up easy and helped in grilling small things.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Keep the drippings adds lost flavor.
customer_reviews.text: First time using with marinated chicken! Everyone remarked how juicy the meat tasted. Now i only used on 1/2 my grill as a test. The picture with the grill without Pad was after 10 min scrapping ,and still needs Cleaning. The padside like never used. Brought pad into house used a little scrubby and after 5 minutes looked like new. I liked it so much just ordered 2 more sets for my sons. Pictures after cooking, Sliding pad over to reveal grill grid, pad after washing, compare grill surface after scrapping left side.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Bolger

customer_reviews.title: Had Holes After Three Uses On the Grill
customer_reviews.text: These mats lasted only 3 uses before they had holes in them and the edges were burned off. We received these mats on May 3rd, 2020 and used them for their final time last night on May 15th, 2020. We used them to grill chicken tenders, hamburgers and hot dogs. We really liked the concept and were excited about keeping our BBQ clean due to using the grill mats. However, they truly weren't able to withstand the heat needed to BBQ standard items.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle 600 degrees as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed. Grilled 20 chicken breasts today. Chicken turned out good, but no grill marks. I can live without the grill marks. Clean up was a breeze; however, I noticed that there are 4 or 5 spots where it nearly burned a hole. I expect it will burn through completely when I use them again. They were advertised as handling heat up to 600 degrees. I watched the grill temperature very closely and the temp never got over 450. Even took longer to cook as I was so careful with the temperature. I would normally cook the chicken around 500 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mat and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This Kona mat works great! I have now used it 3 times and I used it to grill steaks, kabobs and hot dogs. all 3 times the food came out browned and even had grill marks. Cleaned up nicely with dish soap and water and it is non stick! Love this grill mat and would definitely recommend. The only way that I would improve this grill mat is if there was a small ledge around the perimeter of the mat to prevent run off on the sides but, I'm not sure if any grill mat has this feature. All in all this is a wonderful mat and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LD Shambach

customer_reviews.title: Death trap!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a heat trap, fire trap, grease trap, death trap! Our grill heated to over 400 degrees in a few minutes. It burnt every item we tried to grill then with no place for the meat droppings to go they lit on fire and almost destroyed our grill. Scared the heck out of me to use this thing! Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: BRE

customer_reviews.title: These grill mats make food juicy, they clean up well and are long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I love these grill mats. Had never used any previously and these had good reviews at a decent price so thought I'd try them. We use them over a charcoal fire and they hold the juices of meat in so it is much more tender and juicy than without the mat. They get pretty cruddy but soaking in hot water and a good scrubbing takes care of the grime. We've grilled on the same one at least a dozen times so they hold up very well. I even bought some to give as gifts. I highly recommend these to anyone who likes to grill.
customer_reviews.author: LDMullins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing job
customer_reviews.text: So I bbq'd 1.5" pork loin chips on the kona grill mats. Not an easy cut to bbq anytime. The mats did an amazing job. Still had deep bbq lines and the meat was perfect with an internal temp of 145° and then a 5 minute rest once pulled off the bbq. The chops had been marinating in a habinero sauce all day. I have become a huge fan of internal temp bbqing and got myself a good digital thermometer that has a long heat resistant cord that allows me to lay read out component far from the grill. The mats performed amazingly and I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: mark r stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great Grilling and Great Savings!
customer_reviews.text: During the six years we’ve had our gas grill, we have had to replace the flavorizer bars and cooking grates twice due to the eroding impact of hot juice and grease touching them. Plus we often left the propane gas on for 5-10 minutes to burn off the grease. After our first use of the Kona BBQ Grill Mat, we turned off the gas immediately. When we removed the mat (after it had cooled) to wash It, the flavorizer bars and cooking grates looked like they were brand new. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Bernlohr

customer_reviews.title: Only if you need the 600 degree version, I don't grill that high.
customer_reviews.text: Of course I like the idea of using a mat on my gas grill, it makes the process easier, especially with vegetables. I also appreciate the fact that it cures flare-ups. When I have too much fat or juices collecting I just cut a couple of slits, problem solved. The reason for 4 stars is I rarely get grill marks, even with a thick heavy steak. Maybe the thickNess has to do with it. Other highly rated mats seem to have no problem. Plus the higher rated mats are guaranteed for life instead of Kona 7 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: You need these for grilling!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. I was finally able to use it this past weekend and it did not disappoint. In fact, it was awesome. I had marinated some chicken tenders and the mat was perfect for these. I didn't have to worry about the food sticking to the grill. The juice from the marinade and chicken just sat there on the mat and the chicken was able to cook in it, thus adding more flavor. And it even left grill marks on the chicken. And cleaning them wasn't too difficult - just put under hot water with some soap and it comes right off. And the best part - not having to clean the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Erickson

customer_reviews.title: No glop.  Nice clean cooking surface.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat. I trimmed it to fit my Weber and have cooked three meals on it. First and foremost it keeps my grill clean and looking new. No glop to contend with. Grill marks and that nice little taste of bark can still be obtained. Wish i had purchased these a few years ago. If you like to grill out just go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gardner

customer_reviews.title: They Melted on First Use
customer_reviews.text: We didn't have instructions, so we threw these on the grill side-by-side and left it to pre-heat for a few minutes on medium-high heat. When we came back out, the grill had gotten above 600 degrees and the mats were melted (beaded up plastic on both sides). Our grill has NEVER gotten that hot in the past. Obviously, we couldn't cook with them after that. We removed the mats and after a hearty scrubbing of the grates, our grill is acting normal again. Perhaps I missed a critical piece of information, but I wouldn't recommend these otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The mat is fantastic! As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this product as my Weber, although reliable, was getting a little long in the tooth. The mat is fantastic! As advertised, it takes the heat, I had it up to 500-degrees. Grill marks were evident. I chose to put a couple of items directly on the grill for about two minutes to get greater grill marking, but it really wasn't necessary. Cleans up exceptionally well and very easily. Soap and water and whatever was left on the grill mat slid straight into the sink and down the drain. I really wished I had purchased this product years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for propane grills
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your grill new! Nothing sticks when cooking with this mat. No burnt grease can get down in your grill. This mat kept my new grill good as new. It turned my budget Weber into an infrared cooking machine. Just the heat gets up through making grill marks and keeping the mess up top, where it's easily washed off in the sink, rather than being caked on burnt crud that never gets removed from the grill and attracts wasps.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have been using other sheets this summer and these are by by far head and shoulders above and NOT being sold as disposable. When you sell something as disposable...it has that ring of temporary or not having as much value as something that is not disposable. I found these to be easy to use and better yet, easy to grill on. People love them for a reason. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faja4x

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good , but not that durable
customer_reviews.text: After 3 uses the Mat Ripped and started to Shred as seen in Photo Attached.... I paid the extra money for what turned out to be no better than the cheaper mats... Not Happy at All Although they stand behind their warranty and replaced the mat.... Tried a second mat (2nd picture attached) and that one ripped/torn after 3 uses .....Maybe it was just a bad batch ... I never run the temperature above 350 degrees and never use the infra red
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mat to grill vegetable (particularly asparagus) without losing any between the grates. This certainly served the purpose. I've also cooked salmon on it, and it was amazing! I've tried to follow the directions and not have it over direct heat, but I don't have enough space. Nonetheless, the mat has held up just fine. I have thrown it in the dishwasher once because instructions said I could. It was still greasy, but I don't see that as a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: dsaladar

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for anything you want to grill
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great for grilling small things like cut up veggies and food that falls apart easily like fish, along with just about anything else you want to grill, plus it holds in the juices so you get that much more flavor that doesn't drip into the flames. It did get a little wavy after a few uses but still works just fine. There’s two to a pack and we have a medium gas grill so I put ours side by side and it covers the grill space perfectly. Food still gets the grill marks but not too much that it turns out burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Rani G. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well and easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: After several uses both on the grill (mostly chicken and veggies) and in the oven (breads, cookies, roasted veggies, etc.) they are working great! Nothing is sticking even without needing to use oil spray, and cleanup has been super easy - just a cloth with soap and water. Highly recommend! On the grill, takes a while to heat up so you don't get quite the same grill lines as putting the meat straight on the grate, but that's worth the (lack of) cleanup effort!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: You might as well pan fry...
customer_reviews.text: I put the mat on my grill and ran the temp up to about 450 degrees. Put the rib eye on and watched in horror as the steak just stewed in its own juices on top of the mat because there's nowhere else for the juices to go. No sear marks, and for sure, no BBQ taste. The steak would have tasted better pan fried. If your main concern is not having to clean your BBQ grill, then go ahead and buy it , but it you want food that actually tastes like it's been barbecued. Can't speak to their longevity because I threw them away that same night.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Fogey

customer_reviews.title: Holds up after numerous uses at extremely high heat!  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many on the market and typically end up throwing them away after a couple uses. These are FAR SUPERIOR than any we have used. Highly recommend. It holds up after numerous uses at extremely high heat on the grill and remains easy to clean and reuse over and over.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Tougher to clean the older they get
customer_reviews.text: Initially they worked great . Bought them back in June of 2018. Slowly they have been getting tougher to keep clean and get rid of that greasy feel no matter how hard we soak them in dish soap. maybe we are doing something wrong. They are incredibly convenient and effective. I just wish they were easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Cashill

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not have one of these sooner????
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we wanted and received, first time cooking went great, nothing stuck to the mat, easy clean up, the best part was I did not have to spend time using a metal brush to clean the grill grates when done if still cooking the traditional way without using the Kona Grill Mat, which is a plus and time saver. Thank you for an awesome product, I will be ordering more for family members for Christmas gifts that are useful and needed!!! Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Figgins

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the grill after baking salmon and using a silicone mat. The clean up was easy, so I was hoping this would be just as good for the grill. I was NOT disappointed! The salmon cooked perfectly and the skin, which is usually a pain to clean off a pan, just slid right off the mat and into the garbage. Took a little longer to get the fine grit off than expected, but no real complaints here. I am happy with the purchase and will keep on using them when I grill from now one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Grenz

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized.
customer_reviews.text: We received the Kona mats on Dec 4 and put one to immediate use on our natural gas gill and did so in spite of outside air temperature of 36 degrees. It worked as advertised. We've used it two additional times. It cleans up quickly. Even got grill marks on two pieces of quickly grilled Sockey salmon. I loved my Yoshi mats, but they quickly became stained and difficult to clean. I am hoping for better results with the Kona. I've read the negative reviews and get the impression the folks might not be following instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Mats caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what we did wrong but we have never had a problem cooking on our grill. We have used other grill mats before and had no problem whatsoever. So when we got these mats, I was excited to use them. However, when we placed them on the grill, the grill became so hot and the flames were out of control. We turn everything down as low as it could go and still, smoke and flames everywhere. We finally were able to get them off the grill (they were literally on fire) and then the grill went back to normal and we were able to cook the rest of our food just fine. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cmgibbs

customer_reviews.title: Sorry guys I REALLY wanted to love this but I CAN'T
customer_reviews.text: We've had the grill pads for a couple of months. We are heavy grillers (low heat of course for best results) and the pad is difficult to wipe clean of fat. Also - it started disintegrating and it even has a hole in it. Heat distribution not great. Sorry guys - still to the old ways. this was going to be the perfect solution but it's not. I followed all MFG guidelines and it still didn't cut it :(
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMore

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I can see the value in trying to keep your grill clean, but it's to "technique sensitive" (i.e. too much blotting up grease when cooking burgers) for my liking. Plus I'd rather stick to BBQ times for standard direct on the grates. I can see where the mat would be more useful for grilling veggies. Have not tried it yet for that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: One time use only
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these. Cleaned them, followed the instructions and used them for the first time tonight. Hoever, I didn't realize it would be my only use. One of the. Is torn apart at the edge and is flaking away more chunks. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Varlese

customer_reviews.title: Recommending to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.text: Just Wow! I wish I found these sooner. Tried out with skinless chicken breasts marinated in a sweet sauce. No sticking at all, just wonderfully seared chicken, slightly charred outside and juicy inside. Can’t wait to use for other meats and veggies that usually stick to the grates like shrimp and whole fish. Cleanup a breeze. Most slipped right off then an easy scrub with soapy water finished the job. Bonus: we usually bring two heavy griddles camping, now we’ll bring these to lay over the grates of the grill and fire ring. So much lighter and non stick!!
customer_reviews.author: CSH

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value, both mats in the trash after only a couple uses.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and monitored the temperature, however both mats got huge bubbles in them, rendering them useless after only a couple of uses. Clean up was reasonably easy and the food, mostly chicken and salmon, tasted fine, however, both mats ended up in the trash. Not a good value, would not recommend. I would have given them a zero rating if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Brink

customer_reviews.title: Pending Use
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to give a review at this time because I am currently using another mat made of copper. I was excited about the product, but after reading some of the concerns from other people, I am hesitant to use the non-stick mats due to the chemicals used in the manufacturing process. So, I purchased another brand made of copper. For now, the mats remain in the original package unopen. I am seriously reconsidering the purchase due to possible health concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Doris L. S

customer_reviews.title: Product does not hold up and manufacturer of product just says return it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: After second use product was rearing on the side. Contacted Kona and was told it is in the 39 day window so you can return it. Had told them that the temperature never exceeded 400-450. I was told problem was from cooking at too high a heat. Description says good to 600 so I do not think that was the issue. Bought same kind of grill sheets at Costco with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: spice lady

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this actually works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this really works. We decided to splurge on mats that had a higher temperature in hopes they would last longer. Hubby puts it on the BBQ, and voila! Much of the mess is eliminated, including drips that clog the BBQ and potentially lure unwelcome guests (like rodents, racoons, etc.) It says they're OK for the dishwasher, so I tried it. But actually, it's more efficient to just toss it in the sink with some sudsy water, and use the dish brush the get it clean in a jiffy. I'd but it again -- but hope I won't need to for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn & Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good grill mats
customer_reviews.text: Good grill mats. Seem to be sturdy and I was able to cut one in half so I can cook on the mat or the grill. I will update this review when I actually use them. Update: After I used the mat I can say I really like it. It browned my pork well and cleanup was a breeze. Cleaned it under hot water with a sponge and soap easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Susie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, satisfaction of knowing I am using a clean grilling surface
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I would like to start with the Positive and say I loved how easy it was to use. The chicken quarters cooked up great and with grill marks. When I was finished and left everything cool down for cleaning. One of the two matts that I used was stuck to the grill creating a small tear as shown in my pictures. So, I was hoping to get out a more than one use before having a tear in the product. The bottom line, I loved how it was easy to use. How I felt knowing that my food was cooking on a clean surface and it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brent & Cindy K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean! Great to use!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered a Weber electric grill and saw these. I've used one of them twice now. They work really well and the grill itself cleans up in a few seconds. Wipe off with a paper towel & stick them in the top rack of the dishwasher to clean. No muss, no mess. I do wish that they came with a small lightweight pouch to store them in though when not in use. I don't think the plastic bag that they came will work for very long.
customer_reviews.author: KevMeist

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick surface and easy cleanup, great way to keep the grill cleaner and the food from burning.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the 1st time the other day on smoking fish, which can be a messy thing. The mat did well to keep the fish from burning and the cleanup was a breeze. With results like that on fish, I'm pretty sure that any other meat is going to be great on it. I am going to be using it when I make bread and pizza as well, I figure it will work better than parchment paper, which partially burns in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: PBota

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to prevent flare ups
customer_reviews.text: Got to use one of the mats (ordered a set of two) last night for brats....extremely happy with the results! I didn't have all the smoke and flare ups that was experienced in the past and the brats ended up perfect....including grill marks. Clean up was extremely easy with some dishwashing soap and water. I look forward to using the mat(s) again especially for grilled veggies and fish. Highly recommend the Kona grill mats!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Way to Save Our Grill!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptical about these mats as never could see putting something between the heat and the meat to be a good thing. Wow, was I wrong! These things are amazing, great cooking, grill marks, and flavor WITHOUT the mess or cleanup issues. We have a true infrared grill and this will have the grill grate lasting forever. Amazing product and doubt we'll ever grill again without one.
customer_reviews.author: infiniteMPG

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Grill Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I pre-heat my grill, toss on the Kona mat, and immediately start grilling on the mat. The Kona mat provides excellent heat distribution, leaves nice grill marks, and is super easy to clean. Everything cleans up easy off this mat. BBQ sauce, sugary marinades, you name it, it comes off with a a gentle cleaning with warm soapy water and a light wipe down. This mat deserves 6 stars, A++++++.
customer_reviews.author: Jack870

customer_reviews.title: my updated review
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review because i am very disappointed in my grill mats. They are shredding along the edges and bbq sauce is awful trying to get off. Ive soaked them in hot soapy water for ever and still i cant get them completely clean. I dont recommend using bbq sauce on these. I once loved these mats . Now im mad i wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: melinda69

customer_reviews.title: A1 Product and A1 Seller
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and transfer the heat extremely well. I have used another brand in the past and these are a huge step up, well worth the price. My previous mats started becoming brittle and getting cracks and holes after a few months, these have a 7 year warranty!! One mat had a small defect in it so I reached out to the seller; very impressed with their quick response and solution (full replacement) even though they stated this would not effect performance. Have only used twice so time will tell if it will stand up, but their warranty and customer support leaves me unconcerned.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Just ok for cooking scallops.  would not do again.
customer_reviews.text: Changed color and stained after one use. Moderately easy to clean. Non stick. Only use on grill would be to keep small items from dropping though grates. Does not allow smoke and drip flavor. Would work better if had 1/4 inch holes throughout surface. Cooking on cast iron skillet over outdoor grill gave much better results. Probably better use is as liner for pizza pan in toaster oven
customer_reviews.author: L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: We grill EVERYTHING on them! Used the copper ones from BBB and they were very difficult to clean and flimsy. We purchased a new turbo grill & wanted to keep the grease out of it as much as possible. I let the grease harden before removing mats and then scrape them with a spatula before cleaning them with soap & water & scrubber in a large utility sink. They come out almost new every time. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: JGFISCHER

customer_reviews.title: did not last
customer_reviews.text: We received these mats on June 2, 2020....Today is September 29, 2020...these mat both fell apart while washing them tonight after bbqing....and 1 of them has never been used. their rating is great but apparently these ones must have been defective...not sure if I should order another set or try another brand....I did not save my paperwork so I probably won't be able to them replaced...
customer_reviews.author: Sugarfoot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I hated cleaning the grill after each use. This leaves the char marks, keeps grease off the grill, makes flipping food simple as food wont stick. Grilling has never been easier! I am careful to watch the heat so I’m not exposing it to 700+ heat. Don’t hesitate to buy this! Cleaning is also simple. Warm water and dawn and your are done in 2 mins. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good mat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace yoshi mats they I previously used. Since there were two I decided to use them on both sides of my grill. I haven't fully decided if I like it on both sides or to keep one side regular grates. The mats themselves are pretty thick, but seem to transfer heat quite well and cleanup is easy....guess I didn't need to get a new grill brush with these.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Feldt

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the food is cooked to perfection
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my grill , have been using this grilling sheet for a while now , food comes out great , no flare ups from the grill and easy to clean Definitely would recommend having kitchen roll near during cooking , as the the sheets didn’t allow any water / fat to drip through to the flames below , there is a build up of water / fat , worth soaking up during cooking
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lodge

customer_reviews.title: a mistake
customer_reviews.text: It's like cooking on a thin griddle . . . juices, fat, etc collect around the food . . . miss the open grate concept. Sloppy, juices popped, fat popped . . . an easy scald. Not easy to clean . . . just think of taking a hot mat off the bbq . . . yes, wait till it cools and the fat congeals! on the plus side . . . easy to turn over food, esp. fish. Give me an open grill anytime!
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Lipson

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product, terrible seller. Warranty not honored.
customer_reviews.text: These things are garbage and do not perform as stated. I got a pack of two. Used the first one 3 times to cook steaks and burgers on low-medium heat as recommended. After the 3rd use, the mat was scorched, melting, and had split through (see pictures). I switched to the 2nd mat and the exact same thing has happened. I reached out to the seller 4 weeks ago to get them exchanged through their “7 year warranty” and I have never received a response. These are really only good for single use and do not last. You should avoid these, and this seller at all costs. They do not standby their product or their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who doesn't like to dirty his grill . His grill burns extra hot but these worked great and kept grill surface clean while still able to grill . Food had same grill marks like direct grill. Everyone remarked how good it worked!! Its reusable but not sure how long it lasts since I'm not using everyday. I like that it is black since grilling turns the copper ones black . The cooper color ones are what I use but I'm thinking to get this next time instead.
customer_reviews.author: blm

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality BBQ mats with a range of sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I have use grill mats before but was very dissatisfied. I was delighted to receive yours. It is thick and no slick or slippery like some others. I use them in my oven. After seeing how well it works I gave the info to a few people in my building that are big into BBQ. We getting ready to move next month and the new place has a gas range, so I am planning to get the ones for under the burners, as well as a few mats for use on cookie sheets and such. I have to commend you on the high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bloveds

customer_reviews.title: Did not live up to its description
customer_reviews.text: We got a new grill so we thought this would make clean up much easier. However, it doesn’t leave any grill marks on our steaks as pictured. The flavor was also not as good. The second time we used it, we put one steak on the mat and the other directly on the grill. The one on the grill tasted much better. I was disappointed with this purchase and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is awesome and they work amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!! Friend referred it to me and I love it!!! Those saying it only worked for a small amount of time and such... probably was misused somehow but do keep in mine it does have a 7 yr warranty. All u have to do is message their site and they will replace them for you :)
customer_reviews.author: Shayleigh Orr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This grill mat was something totally new to me and I was very reluctant as I thought it would be just another gimmick to take my money.... Well I must say I was pleasantly surprised! The meat does take slightly longer to cook, but the results are impressive. Even a well done steak remains juicy. This will turn you into a grill chef immediately and also I realized my grill didn't flare up from the grease drippings. Happy customer right here 👍🏽😎
customer_reviews.author: Doug C

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Mats Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Up until now, we have sworn by the Miracle Grill Mat. Nothing has come close to it. Then it went out of business. We have been on the hunt for a replacement for months. We tried Yoshi Copper Mats, they were not even same ballpark as the Miracle Grill Mat. Then we stumble across the Kona BBQ Mats and had are minds blown!! These are by far the best mats on the market!! Nothing compares to the Kona BBQ Mats! They are easier to clean, thicker, cook more evenly, they are wider, everything is better with these mats! I can't sing their praises enough! Thank you. Thank you! Wr are buying another set now!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Furniss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it first time last night , we did two ribeyes on a gas grille (new) . The steaks came out perfectly , they were top quality from a local Fresh Market, the mat was exactly what the company said it would be . We will work on the time and methods used on the meat as far as the searing . My wife was amazed as to how easy the mat cleaned up and the grill still looks unused ( yea ! no clean up ) .I will tell my neighbors about the KONA
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

product_meta.title: Kona Best BBQ Grill Mat - Heavy Duty 600 Degree Non-Stick Mats (Set of 2) - 7 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: NEW SPRING SALE! Stock up now and save a bundle with our Kona grill and baking mat sale. These grill accessories are unique bbq gifts men & barbecue lovers truly enjoy. ▶️▶️ Also Try The Kona XL Grill Mat, Covers An Entire 4 Burner Grill.
FAR MORE SUPERIOR than other grill mats. The one and only 600 DEGREE Peak Temperature PFOA free BBQ grill and smoke mat.

KONA IS THE THICKEST at 0.39mm. That is 4X Thicker Than Yoshi grill mat and 2X Thicker Than Miracle grill mat. Kona non stick grill mats can be used over 1,000 uses per side, that's 50 times more uses than ordinary grilling mats, and why they are used by top amateur grillmasters and professional chefs worldwide.

CLEANLY & EASILY GRILL the juiciest steaks, smoke the tenderest chicken and sautee the thinnest cut vegetables with ease. Forget grill baskets and other accessories! These mats also keep your Weber, Traeger, Char Broil, Kamado, steak grilling pan, etc. looking shiny new.

BEST OF ALL you automatically get our "No Hassle" 7 year Kona grilling accessories guarantee, which even covers accidental overheating. Scroll down to "Special Offers And Promotions" to save even more money on todays purchase. Then, click "Add to Cart" now!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars9,270 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
